changeSet.author: Saphyra
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO elite_base.item_type (item_name, type) SELECT name, CASE WHEN type = 'OUTFITTING' THEN 'EQUIPMENT' WHEN type = 'SHIPYARD' THEN 'SPACESHIP' END FROM elite_base.loadout GROUP BY name, type;
INSERT INTO elite_base.item_type (item_name, type) SELECT commodity_name, type FROM elite_base.commodity GROUP BY commodity_name, type;

changeSet.author: Saphyra
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO elite_base.item_commodity(item_name, external_reference, location_type, market_id, buy_price, sell_price, demand, stock) SELECT commodity_name, external_reference, commodity_location, market_id, buy_price, sell_price, demand, stock FROM elite_base.commodity WHERE type='COMMODITY';

changeSet.author: Saphyra
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO elite_base.item_fc_material(item_name, external_reference, location_type, market_id, buy_price, sell_price, demand, stock) SELECT commodity_name, external_reference, commodity_location, market_id, buy_price, sell_price, demand, stock FROM elite_base.commodity WHERE type='FC_MATERIAL';

changeSet.author: Saphyra
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO elite_base.item_equipment(item_name, external_reference, location_type, market_id) SELECT name, external_reference, commodity_location, market_id FROM elite_base.loadout WHERE type='OUTFITTING';

changeSet.author: Saphyra
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO elite_base.item_spaceship(item_name, external_reference, location_type, market_id) SELECT name, external_reference, commodity_location, market_id FROM elite_base.loadout WHERE type='SHIPYARD';
